column2: This afternoon has been dark as night in my hometown (literally, because of the smoke from all the wildfires in the area that's blocked out the sun). So many people are on evacuation notice or alert right now. Pray for rain. Pray for rain. Pray for rain.

JUST IN: Authorities have finally reduced evacuation orders just inside of Douglas County between Trail and Tiller along Tison Rd from a Level 2 "Be Set" warning to a Level 1 "Be Ready" notice. This area was originally elevated due to the S Umpqua Complex. https://t.co/juPbg3dZdy
